Detailed Description

Params Structures for specific modules in the reconstruction
Parameters:
name Name of algorithm
numSets Number of subsets
numIterations Maximum number of iterations in this run. All algorithms except "simulation"
numRealizations Number of realizations of simulation Only for algorithm "simulation"
priorStrength Bayesian regularizer parameter. All algorithms except "simulation"
float relaxParam Relaxation parameter (certain algorithms only)
priorName Name of prior
neighborhoodX distance parameters of the prior (voxels)
neighborhoodY distance parameters of the prior (voxels)
neighborhoodZ distance parameters of the prior (voxels)
n_Q Number of randomized events per unit time (sec)
algorithmKeys Any additional algorithm parameter names key=value pairs, comma separated
algorithmValues Any additional algorithm parameter values
nSimEvents 
outputIterationIncrement how many iterations between image saves
verbosity level of output
Qthreshold fraction of max or average of Q image
enableOutputMasking truncate high voxels on this number of edge slices def=5, i.e., 5 lices on either end
enableInitLambdaMasking enable the init masking of the lambda
initialValue the initail value of the lambda image
boundaryBackOff[2] number of pixels by which to back off the mu image for the image [0] and the LORs [1] default is 5,3
